name: Configure DNS server for OpenShift
extra_vars:
key_name: example.key
server_ip: ansible_tower_ip
zone_name: ocp.example.com

name: Deploy  Virtual Machine on VMWARE
extra_vars:
adddisk: false
vm_core_per_cpu: 1
vm_cpu_count: 1
vmware_datacenter: Default-DataCenter
vmware_datastore: DefaultCluster
vmware_disk_size: 20
vmware_folder: /
vmware_network: VM Network
vmware_new_hostname: '{{ server_name }}'
vmware_ram_mb: 2048
vmware_state: poweredon
vmware_template_name: '{{ vm_template_name }}'

name: dns server workflow update A record
Test jumpbox for Ansible tower connection
update A record for OpenShift node
extra_vars:
---
dns_key_name: example.key
dns_server_ip: '{{ dns_server }}'
dns_zone: ocp.example.com
user_data_file: /etc/named/workingkey.key.

name: Validate DNS Server Entry
extra_vars:
---
a_record: test
dns_key_name: example.key
dns_server_ip: '{{ ansible_default_ipv4.address }}'
dns_zone: ocp.example.com
ip_address: use_dummy_ip_to_test_a_record
user_data_file: /etc/named/example.key

name: Wipe vmware vm
extra_vars:
---
vcenter_cluster: null
vcenter_datacenter: vsphere.example.com
vm_name: test

description: Ansible Tower will run on this machine
extra_vars:
---
adddisk: false
vm_core_per_cpu: 1
vm_cpu_count: 2
vmware_disk_size: 30
vmware_disk_two_size: 0
vmware_ram_mb: 4096

workflow_nodes.name: node1
workflow_nodes.unified_job_name: Test jumpbox for Ansible tower connection

spec.question_name: Enter your dns zone name (Example: ocp.example.com):

name: WF - Deploy OpenShift Jumpbox

description: Deploy Master Node VM needed for OpenShift
extra_vars:
---
adddisk: true
vm_core_per_cpu: 1
vm_cpu_count: 4
vmware_disk_size: 50
vmware_disk_two_size: 180
vmware_ram_mb: 16384

workflow_nodes.name: node2
workflow_nodes.unified_job_name: update A record for OpenShift node

spec.question_name: Enter your dns zone name (Example: ocp.example.com):
